title: "Sweet spot" for equity investors is now, says Ken Kamen
text:
"Sweet spot" for equity investors is now, says Ken Kamen 8:06pm BST - 05:32
The president of Mercadien Asset Management tells Reuters' Fred Katayama he likes equities for now but adds that investors may reposition their portfolios at year's end as yields climb higher. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
The president of Mercadien Asset Management tells Reuters' Fred Katayama he likes equities for now but adds that investors may reposition their portfolios at year's end as yields climb higher.
